typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	triggerTime as string
}
source(output(
		table_name as string,
		update_dt as timestamp,
		PK as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	moveFiles: ['/providence-health/input/pk','/providence-health/input/pk/moved']) ~> PKTable
source(output(
		PK as integer,
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	moveFiles: ['/providence-health/input/tables','/providence-health/input/tables/moved']) ~> InputData
source(output(
		PK as integer,
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ExistingData
ExistingData, InputData exists(ExistingData@PK == InputData@PK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> FilterUpdatedData
InputData, PKTable exists(InputData@PK == PKTable@PK,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> FilterDeletedData
FilterDeletedData, FilterUpdatedData union(byName: true)~> AppendExistingAndInserted
AppendExistingAndInserted sink(input(
		PK as integer,
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ParquetCrudOutput
